Introduction

Oh Seung Ah (오승아; also simply as Seungah) is a South Korean singer under STARHUE Entertainment and MADA Entertainment. She was a member of the girl group Rainbow and its subunit Rainbow Blaxx until their disbandment in 2016. She changed her name to Oh Seung-Ah from Oh Se Mi (오세미).
